snippet: Arsenal answered its early-season critics with a 3-0 victory at Fenerbahce in the first leg of their Champions League playoff.
abstract: Arsenal defeats Fenerbahce, 3-0, in the first leg of their Champions League playoff; other soccer matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Arsenal answered its early-season critics with a 3-0 victory at Fenerbahce in the first leg of their Champions League playoff.

headline.main: Arsenal Takes First Leg in Champions Playoffs
